item.title: [archived] Social Justice
item.description: Archival Note: This version has been successful in conveying the narrative, tone and intent of the story. However, it is written in a rather literal and expository manner that doesn't do the story enough justice. It is preserved here in recognition of its merit. First published on Genesis Planetary on 24 Jun 2017. [This is a work of fiction. Names, characters, businesses, places, events and incidents are either the products of the authorâ€™s imagination or used in a fictitious manner.
